name: select-by
description: Select text range based on certain criteria (regex,...) and move cursor by regex

commands.title: Select text range based on regex 1
Select text range based on regex 2
Select text range based on regex 3
Select text range based on regex 4
Select text range based on regex 5
Select text range based on regex
Paste clipboard and select
Place cursor based on line number, uses boolean expression
Remove Cursor from Below
Remove Cursor from Above
Swap the anchor and active (cursor) position of the selection(s)
Create separate cursors for anchor and active position of the selection(s)
Modify the anchor and active position of the selection(s)
Mark position of cursor(s), create selection(s) on next mark
Restore the position of the cursors to the marked location
Add a new selection at an offset (default: 1)
Modify (extend/reduce) the last selection by moving the Active position "offset" of characters left/right (default: 1)
Move the last selection number of characters left/right (default: 1)
Move cursor based on regex
Move cursor based on calculation by keybinding

selectby.regexes.description: Object with parameters for the different regexes

flags.description: (Optional) string with the regex flags "i" and/or "m" (default: "")

backward.description: (Optional) regular expression to search from the selection start (or cursor) to the start of the file, or false (to override User setting)

forward.description: (Optional) regular expression to search for from the selection end (or cursor) to the end of the file, or false (to override User setting)

forwardAllowCurrentPosition.description: (Optional) is the current selection end an allowed forward position (default: true)

forwardShrink.description: (Optional) do we reduce (shrink) at the current selection end. Find previous "forward" regular expression relative to selection end. (default: false)

backwardAllowCurrentPosition.description: (Optional) is the current selection start an allowed backward position (default: true)

backwardShrink.description: (Optional) do we reduce (shrink) at the current selection start. Find next "backward" regular expression relative to selection start. (default: false)

forwardNext.description: (Optional) regular expression to search for starting at the end of the forward search to the end of the file, or false (to override User setting)

backwardInclude.description: (Optional) should the matched backward search text be part of the selection (default: true)

forwardInclude.description: (Optional) should the matched forward search text be part of the selection (default: true)

forwardNextInclude.description: (Optional) should the matched forwardNext search text be part of the selection (default: true)

forwardNextExtendSelection.description: (Optional) should we extend the selection with the matched forwardNext search text if the begin of the selection matches the forward regex (default: false)

surround.description: (Optional) regular expression to search around the current selection, the selection is somewhere in the text to select, or false (to override User setting)

copyToClipboard.description: (Optional) copy the selection to the clipboard (default: false)

showSelection.description: (Optional) modify the selection to include the new searched positions. Useful if `copyToClipboard` is true. (default: true)

debugNotify.description: (Optional) show a notify message of the used search properties (User and Workspace properties are merged) (default: false)

moveby.description: (Optional) regular expression to search for, Used only by moveby.regex

label.description: (Optional) Label to use in the QuickPick list for the command selectby.regex

description.description: (Optional) Description to use in the QuickPick list on the same line for the command selectby.regex

detail.description: (Optional) Detail to use in the QuickPick list on a separate line for the command selectby.regex

moveby.revealType.description: How to reveal the cursor if it moves outside visible range.

moveby.regexes.description: Object with parameters for the different regexes

flags.description: (Optional) string with the regex flags "i" and/or "m" (default: "")

regex.description: (Optional) the regex to use, if not given ask for a regex

ask.description: (Optional) ask for a regex if "regex" property not given

properties.description: (Optional) strings that determine how to use the regex: next/prev, start/end, wrap/nowrap (default: ["next", "end", "nowrap"])

repeat.description: (Optional) how many times to perform the search, or "ask" (default: 1)

checkCurrent.description: (Optional) check if current cursor position is a possible match (default: false)

debugNotify.description: (Optional) show a notify message of the used search properties (User and Workspace properties are merged) (default: false)

label.description: (Optional) Label to use in the QuickPick list for the command selectby.regex

description.description: (Optional) Description to use in the QuickPick list on the same line for the command selectby.regex

detail.description: (Optional) Detail to use in the QuickPick list on a separate line for the command selectby.regex
